author: Xbox
description:
Wuyang is finally here for some hydration domination!

As a prodigy from Wuxing University’s Water College, Wuyang redefines what it means to heal with a hybrid playstyle built on flow, precision, and constant disruption.

With his Xuanwu Staff and mobility-focused kit, you’ll be able to support or deal pressure depending on the situation, and reposition yourself with ease to escape danger or claim space. 

Test the waters with Wuyang in his Hero Trial Aug 14–18 and keep the party going when he officially arrives in Season 18 ✨

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on Xbox & PC!

https://www.xbox.com/games/overwatch-2

title: Wuyang | New Hero Gameplay Trailer | Overwatch 2

author: Xbox
description:
Get ready to explore bold new worlds and discover the hottest indie gems of the season in the 2025 Summer Spotlight! From thrilling action to immersive storytelling, this sizzle reel showcases the most exciting new releases on Xbox.
 
Whether you're into epic quests, fast-paced shooters, or creative indie experiences, there's something here for every gamer.

Play what’s next. Play what’s bold. Play Summer Spotlight 2025.

author: Xbox
description:
From the arcade to your console. The race is on.

Fast & Furious: Arcade Edition brings the thrill of the hit arcade racer home. Drift through favorite tracks, smash through shortcuts, and outrun the competition in a high-speed arcade style showdown. Choose from a garage of legendary supercars, customize your ride, and race solo or side-by-side in adrenaline-fueled multiplayer action.

Coming to Xbox Series X|S!
